body: This is actually chapter 1. The author is just tricking us by disguising chapter 8 as chapter 1. Chapter 2 is the real chapter 1. Chapter 1 is actually the last chapter. #mindfucked
It just baffles me how stupid the heroines in NTR could be.
it's just you.. yuzuki had make a lot of ntr back in the days

Is it just me or does Yuzuki's art not match with NTR stories.....

 @Ravenleaf ah i didn't read this most recent ones. And yea most of the better artists tend to write NTR stories while others write completes sluts. I prefer slutty stories followed by NTR due to the rather hardcore sex. Altough vanilla is great from time to time. I've been seeing lesser and lesser vanilla works. Pretty sad.

@miltasha okay, stand corrected on the she, but I think the amount of feels one has is related to how much they can relate to the content. Yuzuki's is always laced with a sense of loss or regret which hits home to some people more I guess.
Shit i overread this was NTR :( aww NTR always kills my boner...

Actually, it's "she". And meh, Yuzuki's works are not that feel. She just tries to make it seems like that, but in the end it's just crap. And this one has typical NTR background too. (threatened because of masturbation)

Hes been doing NTR stuff for awhile now, no? you couldn't have been totally unprepared. I have to admit though, for someone that wrote really good stories and beautiful art (Actually is it just me or is a lot of the best art by people that specialize in NTR?)  Yuzuki's pack a pretty strong punch to the feels
Ugh, I actually love ntr but I don't read Yuzuki's works for ntr...... T_T why did he change.......I wasn't in the mindset for ntr......
